jobs.title: Customer Care Representative - Position Filled
jobs.description:
OVERVIEW

Our Customer Care Representatives are responsible for delivering outstanding service to our valued customers through medians of telephone, email or in-store as required. 

CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

-	Respond to telephone and e-mail enquiries promptly and with consideration.
-	Provide solutions promptly and with confidence to increase customer loyalty. 
-	Process transactions and monitor customer journey throughout order timeline. 
-	Record and analyse customer interactions using the guidelines and training provided. 
-	Place mail orders while recognising opportunities to increase sales.
-	Build reports using systems provided and
-	Stock check and ability to review and amend product inventories.   
-	Utilise resources and information to assist customers in selection or queries in an informed manner. 
-	Ability to retain and convey thorough knowledge of Wildsmith Skin products, provenance, benefits, ingredients and application.
-	Use various computer systems to gather information and troubleshoot customer issues. Where appropriate, refer unresolved customer issues to the relevant person or department.
-	Develop personal customer relationships with return customers and wholesale accounts.
-	Other duties identified and given by a manager.

REQUIREMENTS 

-	Excellent written and verbal communication. 
-	Intuitive and accommodating approach adept in handling customer requests and queries in an empathetic, patient and positive manner. 
-	Proactive, adaptable and willing to undertake new tasks. 
-	Experience and proven success in customer service. 
-	Punctual, good time keeping and organised proficient work manner.
-	Detail orientated with a focus on quality and accuracy
-	Ability to take on new challenges and multi-task to improve efficiency and quality of customer service.
-	Quick to learn and work independently when required.
-	Take ownership of their role as well as work proficiently in a team environment
-	Candidates must understand market and consumer needs and be able to communicate such needs to retail partners and management.
